situation.title: Crossing the green border
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for crossing the green border.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Border controls have not been reintroduced and no controls are taking place yet at the borders with our neighboring countries, so crossing the green border is possible.

However, the situation may change. We recommend checking the news on the website of the Ministry of the Interior.

If internal border controls were reintroduced in neighboring states, this information would appear on this link.
